blog.title: Wasabi Wallet 2.0 Will Offer Automatic CoinJoins by Default to Boost Privacy
blog.description: One of the main Wasabi Wallet 2.0 improvements is not just to the CoinJoin design through WabiSabi, but also its usability. We could see it debut in about nine months.
